Posts.EditableText:
I was wondering if Alex possibly had done some tinkering with the QuestNet Pro builds lately as I decided to reinstall the latest version and I am having some problems saving rooms. Rooms made through the 'create room' syntax aren't saving their properties, and rooms made through 'clone #room#' are saving their properties but being restored as objects. 

I'm fairly sure I remember atleast the 'create room' problem had been ironed out.

Any changes made recently? I'm using 3.53 (build 3.5.99)
